title: 32: OBITCH order in the court...
description:
Happy Thursday Geoffs! This week you are in for a wild ride. Madison discusses the wild world of crime scene cleaners, Spencer has the trial of the century…well a century anyway..we’ve got some legendary obituaries, and of course, some dumb.ass.criminalllllllls! Let’s do this! 

Follow along online: instagram.com/obitchuarypod
Write to us: obitpod@gmail.com
Sponsors: 
Better Help: Visit betterhelp.com/obit to save 10% on your first month!
Bombas: Keep it comfy! Visit bombas.com/obit and you’ll save 20% on your purchase! 
Hello Fresh: Go to hellofresh.com/obit16 and use code ‘obit16’ for up to 16 free meals + 3 free gifts!
Sources: 
http://www.legacy.com/ns/sylvia-browne-obituary/168121834 https://www.atlasobscura.com/articles/morbid-monday-cadaver-synod https://www.ripleys.com/weird-news/cadaver-synod/ https://www.newsweek.com/coffin-confessor-tell-secrets-beyond-grave-1529381 https://cooperfuneralhome.com/tribute/details/661/Frank-Ranallo-Sr/obituary.html#tribute-start https://www.foxnews.com/us/florida-storm-drain-texas-tunnel https://biorecovery.com/safety-gear-when-cleaning-crime-scenes/#:~:text=Equipment%20commonly%20used%20by%20professionals%20to%20clean%20up,protective%20suit%2C%20disposable%20non-porous%20gloves%20and%20filtered%20respirators https://www.ladbible.com/more/interesting-what-happens-in-the-life-of-a-crime-scene-cleaner-20170202 https://www.aetv.com/shows/the-first-48/real-crime/crime-scene-cleaners-neal-smither-interview https://www.mentalfloss.com/article/553028/secrets-crime-scene-cleaners https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Crime_scene_cleanup https://www.smcoloradosprings.com/evidence-left-behind-cleaning-up-a-crime-scene/ See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
